Name: The Last Time (AKA Stop Fiddling With My Drink)
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of square of white chocolate balanced on rim.
Review: Richly flavoured and yet dry – rum and subtle desiccated coconut with monastic herbal sweetness dried by aromatic fino sherry and vanilla bitters.
History: Created in April 2017 by Paloma, my better half, at the Cabinet Room in London, England. Named after she instructed yours truly to stop trying to make the drink she'd just created better.
Nutrition: One serving of The Last Time (AKA Stop Fiddling With My Drink) contains 191 calories
